content.description:
Scary because of rock quality. 

  Sit start using the crack and work right or just start on the right side of the boulder with a left undercling and a right hand on the side. Make a few moves until it's possible to throw up for the good edge above. Sketchy topout. 

**Stars are relative to the park. Very low standards.**
content.location: Right side when looking toward the path with the road behind you.

content.description:
Second climbable boulder on the left. Routes are on the backside when approaching from the path. 

  The boulder has a somewhat interesting topout which, if it was clear of moss, might actually make for some interesting moves. It also has a striking though tragically short and chossy arête on the right side. 

*Stars are relative to the park. Very low standards**
